entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
